tool_description: A simple Rock Paper Scissor game API
title: Rock Paper Scissor

api_list.name: choice
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rock-paper-scissor2.p.rapidapi.com/api/{choice}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rock-paper-scissor2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
